column2: "Hehe. You did very well, you know? Lisa doesn't even need to see a report; she was watching you out in the field."
"The best part was when all those enemies ran around fruitlessly only to get torn to shreds by a hail of bullets. Isn't Ranger just wonderful?!"
"You took a lot of Lisa's kills, you know? Normally she'd be upset, but this brought something to Lisa's attention!"
"It can also be nice to watch other people kill. Not a bad feeling, you know? Lisa learned something new thanks to you!"
"Well then, well then! Let's go terrorize and torment some more enemies again sometime soon, you know?!"
